TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SharePointCommandCanceledException extends Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointCommandException

summary.span: 当用户取消 SharePoint 命令时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is raised when a SharePoint command is canceled by user.

span.span: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

span.span: The message that describes the error.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不是 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing），则在处理内部异常的 catch 块中会引发当前异常。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public SharePointCommandCanceledException (string message, string commandId, string fullTypeName, string originalStackTrace);

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: commandId
param.span: 引发异常的命令的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the command that thrown the exception.

param.name: fullTypeName
param.span: 引发异常的命令类的完整类型名称。

span.span: The full type name of the command class thrown the exception.

param.name: originalStackTrace
param.span: vssphost4.exe 进程中异常的原始堆栈跟踪。

span.span: The original stack trace of the exception in the vssphost4.exe process.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息、完整类型名称和原始堆栈跟踪来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message, full type name and the original stack trace.

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: commandId
param.span: 引发异常的命令的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the command that thrown the exception.

param.name: fullTypeName
param.span: 引发异常的命令类的完整类型名称。

span.span: The full type name of the command class thrown the exception.

param.name: originalStackTrace

span.span: The original stack trace of the exception in the vssphost4.exe process.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不是 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing），则在处理内部异常的 catch 块中会引发当前异常。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息、完整类型名称、原始堆栈跟踪和对导致该异常的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message, full type name, the original stack trace and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
